Your Name # Welcome to my portfolio! I’m a computer engineer with a passion for embedded systems, hardware design, and software development. Here you’ll find a showcase of my projects, skills, and experience.
üöÄ Projects # Embedded Systems Projects # Project Title 1 # Description: Briefly describe the project, e.g., “Designed a real-time IoT system using ESP32 to collect sensor data and display insights on a web dashboard.” Technologies: List key tools, e.g., ESP32, C, FreeRTOS, AWS. Highlights: Feature 1 Feature 2 Project Title 2 # Description: Briefly describe the project. Technologies: Microcontroller, Language/Tool, Protocol. Highlights: Feature 1 Feature 2 Computer Hardware Projects # Project Title 3 # Description: Describe your hardware project, e.g., “Implemented a pipelined RISC-V processor with dynamic branch prediction and load-store queue.” Technologies: SystemVerilog, Synopsys VCS, FPGA. Highlights: Feature 1 Feature 2 Project Title 4 # Description: Briefly describe the project. Technologies: Hardware Language, Tool, Platform. Highlights: Feature 1 Feature 2 Software Development Projects # Project Title 5 # Description: Describe your software project, e.g., “Developed a secure HTTP server using Rust for an IoT platform.” Technologies: Rust, Async/Await, Networking. Highlights: Feature 1 Feature 2 Project Title 6 # Description: Briefly describe the project. Technologies: Language, Framework, Purpose. Highlights: Feature 1 Feature 2 üõ†Ô∏è Skills # Programming Languages # C | C++ | Rust | Python | SystemVerilog Tools & Frameworks # FreeRTOS | AWS IoT | ESP-IDF | Synopsys VCS | Git Hardware Platforms # ESP32 | STM32 | FPGA | Custom RISC-V Implementations Miscellaneous # Networking protocols: HTTP, TCP/IP Hardware debugging: Logic Analyzers, Oscilloscopes Version control: Git üë®‚Äçüíª Experience # Your Job/Internship Title | Company Name # Description of your role. Highlight your key accomplishments. Your Role Title | Institution # Description of your work or research. Highlight key projects or outcomes. üìú Education # [Your Degree] in [Your Field] # [Your University] | Graduated: [Year]
üì¨ Contact # Email: your.email@example.com LinkedIn: linkedin.com/in/yourprofile GitHub: github.com/yourusername Thank you for visiting my portfolio! Feel free to reach out if you have any questions or collaboration ideas.
